column1: Little Goat Diner////I thought this place was great! The portions were quite large
column2: we ended up taking half out meal home! Dude ordered a bull's eye french toast
column3: which is like a twist on chicken and waffles
column4: and what a twist! The runny egg is in the center of the bread
column5: and everything is sweet and syrupy and then the fried chicken is crispy and flavorful
